game.title: Craft-Runner
game.description: Craft Runner is an endless runner game with a unique twist. The player has no direct control over the main character. Instead, they can build boxes and springboards to create a safe path for the character. By building bridges or stairs and covering dangerous obstacles, the player tries to keep the character alive for as long as possible through a series of randomly chosen level chunks.

features.feature: Run and build to get as far as possibly!
